reviews.customers_say: Customers find these underwear comfortable and well-fitting, with one mentioning they're perfect for working out. The cotton material is breathable and soft, with one customer noting it's 95% cotton and 5% spandex. Moreover, they effectively prevent thigh chaffing and don't ride up or roll down. However, opinions about sizing are mixed, with some finding them perfect while others say they run small.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars VERY comfortable
items.body: Let me start with the one thing that attracts buyers to this type of women's underpants - comfort. These boxers are 95% cotton (along with the standard 5% spandex), so they breathe, feel good against your skin and wash well. But it's the comfort that will keep me coming back for more. They fit like a second skin, which is something I have never gotten from any other boxers I have purchased - and I've purchased a lot of boxers. This smooth, close fit is what prevents chafing, and since the seams are nicely finished, there's really nothing to rub or irritate. And as for the price, I have paid more for a single pair of boxers from a well known brand than I paid for the entire pack of four here on Amazon. Read more
items.author: 24karats

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So comfortable.
items.body: These have quickly become a favorite for everyday comfort. The cotton fabric is soft, breathable, and provides great coverage without riding up. They’re perfect for wearing under dresses or just lounging at home, and the anti-chafing design really works. I also appreciate that they’re available in both regular and plus sizes with a consistent fit. Practical, comfortable, and exactly what I was looking for. Read more
items.author: Christine Dolan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I will wear these til the day I die!
items.body: First off: I will only wear cotton shorts or panties. I am a fat girl and I sweat. These are PERFECT because they are lightweight and cool and comfortable. The crotch has an extra liner to wick moisture. They are long enough that you could wear them around the house and yard without feeling embarrassed if someone catches a glimpse of you. They are not see thru. I weigh 250 and I ordered a size 5X and they fit great. PLEASE DON'T EVER STOP MAKING THESE!!!! Read more
items.author: ShoppingAtNight

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable Fit
items.body: Had doubts but once began wearing.. different story. These are very comfortable /soft and not binding Can even wear as shorts with a long T-shirt. The only drawback is being more cotton and more coverage you tend to retain heat especially when wearing pants Read more
items.author: Karin P

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super comfy
items.body: I’ve bought a second pack after having them for years. They’re so comfortable for sleep or around the house. Work well under jeans, sweatpants, or any loose leg pant. Cool colors too! Read more
items.author: Rebecca

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A "must have" for girls with thick thighs!
items.body: This is the 3rd year in a row that I buy a pack of these, because they're that amazing! I usually buy then during the summer, as that is when us thick thighed girls get the most sweaty. These are the benefits of these underwear in my opinion. 1. Cotton - They are made of cotton so they absorb alot of the moisture during the hot months which I love ❤️ it makes them more comfortable. 2. Versitile - You can wear them as shorts around the house which is beneficial all year round but especially during the summer. The material is thick enough where it doesn't look scandalous if you have roommates or gotta step outside in your driveway for some reason, but thin enough that it feels breezy. 3. Comfortable - They are long enough so they don't roll up your thighs. I've always had a problem finding boxer shorts that were long enough so that they don't roll up under your pants and become uncomfortable. These always stay perfectly put. 4. Durable - Even though I've bought these for 3 years in a row and wear them almost daily (they've definitely been used a lot and been through the washer plenty of times) they are holding up amazingly. They are not ripping or thinning in between the thigh area where the thighs touch which has been a problem for me in the past. The only reason I keep buying more pairs is because I want to have extras and don't want to resort to having to wear any other underwear besides these for when I go on trips or can't do laundry Overall, I recommend these and in my opinion, they're definitely worth the money. Read more
items.author: Elizabeth

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cotton not silky
items.body: These are cotton and would be good and comfortable to sleep in or under a dress. Read more
items.author: Msbetty

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cotton boxer shorts
items.body: Great underwear! Very soft, ,stretchable cotton fabric.I bought these shorts for nightwear. Very comfortable, seamless! Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Kamen

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: White-4pack, Black-4pack, Multicolor-4pack, Multicolor-4pack-03, Beige-4pack, Multicolor-4pack-02. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
